name: Worms World Party Remastered
description: Do not change install directory during installation

files.installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer

content:
files:
- installer: N/A:Please select the GOG.com Windows installer
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/GOG Games/Worms World Party Remastered/w2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    install_gecko: false
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: directx9
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: d3dx9_43
    arch: win32
    description: Installing DirectX 9_43
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
    silent: true
- task:
    app: xact
    arch: win32
    description: Installing xact
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: wmp10
    arch: win32
    description: Installing wmp10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: vcrun2005
    arch: win32
    description: Installing vcrun2005
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
system:
  disable_monitoring: true
  disable_runtime: false
  pulse_latency: true
  reset_pulse: true
winesteam:
  overrides:
    xaudio2_6: native
    xaudio2_7: native
